   14: 
   15: """Type aliases used by bson"""
   16: from __future__ import annotations
   17: 
   18: from typing import TYPE_CHECKING, Any, Mapping, MutableMapping, TypeVar, Union
   19: 
   20: if TYPE_CHECKING:
   21:     from array import array
   22:     from mmap import mmap
   23: 
   24:     from bson.raw_bson import RawBSONDocument
   25: 
   26: 
   27: # Common Shared Types.
   28: _DocumentOut = Union[MutableMapping[str, Any], "RawBSONDocument"]
   29: _DocumentType = TypeVar("_DocumentType", bound=Mapping[str, Any])
   30: _DocumentTypeArg = TypeVar("_DocumentTypeArg", bound=Mapping[str, Any])
   31: _ReadableBuffer = Union[bytes, memoryview, "mmap", "array"]
